alert.note: Alert for Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 10:00PM CDT until July 19 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Wood County in central Wisconsin... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1000 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pittsville, or 17 miles northwest of Wisconsin Rapids, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wisconsin Rapids and Lake Wazeecha. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
